text: niyata vasayenma allahge sannidhanayehi masayange gananaya (ek vasarakata) edalahaki. (mesema) ahasda, bhumiyada utpadanaya kala dina sita allah visin manakkalpita karanu læba ætteya. evayen (masa) hatarak parisuddhaya. meyayi rju dharmaya. ebævin mevayehi (oba yuddha kara), obatama oba haniyak kara nogata yutuya. ehet samanayan taba namadina siyallanma (ema masayanhidida) oba samaga yuddha kalahot, esema obat (ovunta viruddhava) siyallan samagama (ema masayanhidida) yuddha karanu. niyata vasayenma allah bhaya bhaktikayin samaga sitinneya yanna sthira vasayen dæna ganu
